Uses of Package
evs.metric.parameters

Packages that use evs.metric.parameters
evs.data Classes for I/O on forecasts, observations and verification pairs. 
evs.gui.utilities Utility classes for the Graphical User Interface (GUI). 
evs.gui.windows Windows in the GUI. 
evs.metric.metrics Verification metrics for the ensemble mean and (ensemble-derived) forecast probabilities. 
evs.metric.parameters Parameters of the verification metrics. 
evs.metric.results Storage of results from the verification metrics. 
 

Classes in evs.metric.parameters used by evs.data
BootstrapParameter
          A store of bootstrap parameters required for assessing the sampling uncertainty of a verification metric via bootstrapping.
 

Classes in evs.metric.parameters used by evs.gui.utilities
DecomposeParameter
          Indicates whether a score will be decomposed.
DoubleParameter
          Records a double parameter for a verification metric.
 

Classes in evs.metric.parameters used by evs.gui.windows
BootstrapParameter
          A store of bootstrap parameters required for assessing the sampling uncertainty of a verification metric via bootstrapping.
 

Classes in evs.metric.parameters used by evs.metric.metrics
BootstrapParameter
          A store of bootstrap parameters required for assessing the sampling uncertainty of a verification metric via bootstrapping.
BoxPooledLeadPointsParameter
          Records the number of points in the box plot pooled by lead time.
BoxUnpooledObsPointsParameter
          Records the number of points in the box plot ordered by size of observation.
BoxUnpooledPointsParameter
          Records the number of points in the unpooled box plot.
CentralSpreadBiasParameter
          Indicates whether the spread-bias plot should be computed in bins around a measure of central tendency.
DecomposeParameter
          Indicates whether a score will be decomposed.
DoubleProcedureArrayParameter
          A metric parameter that comprises a set of double procedures of the same type.
DoubleProcedureParameter
          Records a double procedure for applying a logical condition to a value.
EqualSamplesParameter
          Indicates whether equal bins (i.e.
FittedAUCParameter
          Indicates whether to estimate the ROC score or AUC from a smooth bivariate model.
FittedROCParameter
          Indicates whether to estimate the ROC from a smooth bivariate model.
ForecastTypeParameter
          Records the types of forecasts to be used in a verification study.
MCRPointsParameter
          Records the number of points in the MCR diagram.
MEPPointsParameter
          Records the number of points in the mean error of probability diagram.
MetricParameter
          An interface for the parameters required by a verification metric.
MinimumSampleSizeParameter
          Records the minimum sample size with which to compute a metric.
PositiveIntegerParameter
          Records an integer parameter for a verification metric.
ProbabilityArrayParameter
          A metric parameter that comprises a set of double probabilities stored in a double array.
RankHistSampleParameter
          Indicates whether absolute or relative frequencies should be used when computing the rank histogram.
ReferenceForecastParameter
          Stores the identifier of a reference forecast used in a skill calculation.
ReliabilityPointsParameter
          Records the number of points to use in the reliability diagram.
ROCPointsParameter
          Records the number of points in the ROC diagram.
ROCScoreMethodParameter
          Records the method used to compute the empirical ROC score.
ROCScorePointsParameter
          Records the number of points used to compute the ROC score.
SpreadBiasPointsParameter
          Records the number of points or bins in the spread-bias plot.
UnconditionalParameter
          Indicates whether unconditional pairs should be used in preference when conditional pairs are available for metric calculation.
VectorFunctionParameter
          Wrapper for using a vector function as a parameter.
 

Classes in evs.metric.parameters used by evs.metric.parameters
BooleanArrayParameter
          A metric parameter that comprises an array of boolean values.
BooleanParameter
          Records a boolean parameter for a verification metric.
DoubleArrayParameter
          A metric parameter that comprises a set of double thresholds stored in a double array.

          Records a double parameter for a verification metric.
DoubleProcedureParameter
          Records a double procedure for applying a logical condition to a value.

          Records an integer parameter for a verification metric.

          An interface for the parameters required by a verification metric.
PositiveIntegerParameter
          Records an integer parameter for a verification metric.
ProbabilityIdentifierParameter
          Indicates whether a double value is a probability or not.
ProbabilityIntervalParameter
          A probability interval with lower and upper bounds such that upper > lower and both lower and upper fall in [0,1].
StringArrayParameter
          A metric parameter that comprises a set of string values stored in a string array.
StringParameter
          Records a string identifier.
